text: Zi Min (Chinese: 籽岷), whose real name is Zhu Minghua (Chinese: 朱明华), was born in Shanghai, China, and his native place is Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province. He is a member of the Communist Party of China. He is one of the main streamers of the game Minecraft in mainland China. His catchphrase is: "Hello everyone, welcome to Zimin's Minecraft game world." == Experiences and events == * In 2010, a documentary about Shanghai Jiuduansha Wetland was uploaded on Youku. * On January 9, 2013, Zi Min uploaded his first Minecraft survival live broadcast on the barrage video website Bilibili. * In January 2023, Zi Min was named one of Bilibili's top 100 Uploaders in 2022. * In January 2024, Zi Min was named one of Bilibili's top 100 Uploaders in 2023. == Famous Sentence == * "Wow! Wow! My magic pickaxe!" * "So strong?!" == References ==
title: Zi Min
